column6:
This preview comic features the origin stories of Golden Age greats "Rockman" from USA Comics #1 (August 1941) by Charles Nicholas and Basil Wolverton and the never-before-reprinted "Laughing Mask" by Will Harr and Maurice Gutwirth from Daring Mystery Comics #2 (February 1940) and Phantom Reporter by Mike Robard and Sam Cooper from Daring Mystery Comics #3 (April 1940) along with character sketches and preview pages of the new series The Twelve by J. Michael Straczynski with art by Chris Weston. ,2007,12
Rated T+...$2.99
